title: F1 Fantasy: top picks & predictions for the 2025 Hungarian GP
summary: Should you stick or twist with your F1 Fantasy team at the 2025 Hungarian? Here are our predictions; tips on drivers to avoid; which chips to play and further analysis

qa_pairs.question: What is F1 Fantasy?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: A fantasy game where participants create teams based on real Formula 1 drivers and teams, scoring points based on their performance in races.

qa_pairs.question: Which type of strategy might players consider when managing their F1 Fantasy team?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: Choosing whether to keep current drivers or replace them based on recent performances.

qa_pairs.question: In F1 Fantasy, what is the purpose of using chips?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: To maximize points in a race by implementing special strategies or boosts.
wrong_options: To select a new race track
